definition: serene and elegant (of a place)/ethereal (of music)
remote/hidden away/secluded/serene/peaceful/to imprison/in superstition indicates the underworld/ancient district spanning Liaonang and Hebei provinces

sentences.english: The campus boasts elegant environment with green plants and fragrant flowers, which is excellent for learning and living.

definition: (of a location) quiet and secluded/beautiful and secluded
